summary.span: 在不回发的情况下允许部分呈现页的各部分。

span.span: Enables sections of a page to be partially rendered without a postback.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [刷新 UpdatePanel 内容Refreshing UpdatePanel Content](#refreshing_updatepanel_content) - [UpdatePanel 使用情况UpdatePanel Usage](#updatepanel_usage) - [应用样式Applying Styles](#applying_styles) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件是 ASP.NET 中 AJAX 功能的核心部分。 controls are a central part of AJAX functionality in ASP.NET. 它们与控件一起用于 启用部分页呈现。They are used with the control to enable partial-page rendering. 当只需更新部分页面时，部分页面呈现可减少同步回发和完成页面更新的需要。Partial-page rendering reduces the need for synchronous postbacks and complete page updates when only part of the page has to be updated. 部分页面呈现改善了用户体验，因为它减少了整页面回发期间发生的屏幕闪烁，并改善了网页交互。Partial-page rendering improves the user experience because it reduces the screen flicker that occurs during a full-page postback and improves Web page interactivity. ## 刷新 UpdatePanel 内容Refreshing UpdatePanel Content 当启用部分页呈现时，控件可以执行一个回发，该回发可更新整个页面或更新一个或多个控件的内容的异步回发 。When partial-page rendering is enabled, a control can perform a postback that updates the whole page or an asynchronous postback that updates the content of one or more controls. 控件是否导致异步回发并更新 控件取决于下列各项：Whether a control causes an asynchronous postback and updates an control depends on the following: - 如果 将控件的属性 设置为，则 会在源自页面的每个回发中更新控件的内容。If the property of the control is set to , the control's content is updated on every postback that originates from the page. 这包括来自其他控件内的控件的异步回发 以及来自不在控件内的控件的回发 。This includes asynchronous postbacks from controls that are inside other controls and postbacks from controls that are not inside controls. - 如果将 属性设置为 ，则 在以下情况下将更新控件的内容：If the property is set to , the control's content is updated in the following circumstances: - 显式调用控件的 方法时 。When you call the method of the control explicitly. - 如果 控件嵌套在另一个 控件中，并且父面板已更新，则为。When the control is nested inside another control, and the parent panel is updated. - 当使用控件的属性定义为触发器的控件导致回发时 `Triggers` 。When a postback is caused by a control that is defined as a trigger by using the `Triggers` property of the control. 在此方案中，控件显式触发面板内容更新。In this scenario, the control explicitly triggers an update of the panel content. 控件可以位于 与触发器关联的控件内部或外部。The control can be either inside or outside the control that the trigger is associated with. - 当 属性设置为时 `true` ，控件的子控件将 导致回发。When the property is set to `true` and a child control of the control causes a postback. 嵌套控件的子控件 不会导致对外部控件的更新， 除非它们显式定义为触发器。Child controls of nested controls do not cause an update to the outer control unless they are explicitly defined as triggers. 不允许将属性设置为 `false` ，并将属性设置为， 并将引发异常。The combination of setting the property to `false` and the property to is not allowed and will throw an exception. 当 控件执行异步 post 时，它将添加一个自定义 HTTP 标头。When the control performs an asynchronous post, it adds a custom HTTP header. 某些代理删除此自定义 HTTP 标头。Some proxies remove this custom HTTP header. 如果发生这种情况，服务器会将请求作为常规回发处理，这将导致客户端错误。If this occurs, the server handles the request as a regular postback, which causes a client error. 若要解决此问题，请在执行异步发布时插入自定义窗体字段。To resolve this issue, insert a custom form field when you perform asynchronous posts. 然后检查标头或服务器代码中的自定义窗体字段。Then check the header or the custom form field in server code. ## UpdatePanel 使用情况UpdatePanel Usage 您可以使用多个 控件来独立更新多个页面区域。You can use multiple controls to update multiple page regions independently. 当第一次呈现包含一个或多个控件的页时 ，所有控件的所有内容 都将呈现并发送到浏览器。When the page that contains one or more controls is first rendered, all the content of all controls are rendered and sent to the browser. 在后续的异步回发中，每个控件的内容 可能不会更新，具体取决于面板设置以及各个面板的客户端或服务器逻辑。On subsequent asynchronous postbacks, the content of each control might not be updated depending on the panel settings and on client or server logic for individual panels. 您还可以将 控件用于以下内容：You can also use controls for the following: - 在用户控件中。In user controls. - 在母版页和内容页上。On master and content pages. - 嵌套在其他 控件中。Nested inside other controls. - 在模板化控件（如 或 控件）中。Inside templated controls such as the or controls. 可以通过声明方式或编程方式添加控件。 controls can be added declaratively or programmatically. 可以 通过编程方式添加控件，但不能以编程方式添加触发器。You can add an control programmatically, but you cannot add triggers programmatically. 若要创建类似触发器的行为，可以将页上的控件注册为异步回发控件。To create trigger-like behavior, you can register a control on the page as an asynchronous postback control. 可以通过调用控件的方法来执行此操作 。You do this by calling the method of the control. 然后，您可以创建一个事件处理程序以响应异步回发，并在处理程序中调用该 控件的方法 。You can then create an event handler that runs in response to the asynchronous postback, and in the handler, call the method of the control. ## 应用样式Applying Styles 控件接受 expando 特性。The control accepts expando attributes. 这使您可以为控件呈现的 HTML 元素设置一个 CSS 类。This lets you set a CSS class for the HTML elements that the controls render. 例如，你可能会创建以下示例中所示的标记：For example, you might create the markup shown in the following example: ``` ``` 当页面运行时，上一示例中的标记将呈现类似于以下内容的 HTML：The markup in the previous example renders HTML similar to the following when the page runs: ```
``` ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```                                                ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示了控件的各种用法 。The following examples show various uses of the control. **UpdatePanel 控件内的控件****Controls Inside an UpdatePanel Control** 下面的示例演示如何在控件中放置控件 ，以便在您发布到服务器时减少屏幕闪烁。The following example shows how to put controls inside an control to reduce screen flicker when you post to the server. 在此示例中， 和 控件位于 控件中。In this example, a and a control are inside an control. 默认情况下， 属性为 ， 属性为 `true` 。By default, the property is and the property is `true`. 因此，面板的子控件导致异步回发。Therefore, child controls of the panel cause an asynchronous postback. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel/CS/UpdatePanelExample1CS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel/VB/UpdatePanelExample1VB.aspx#1)] **带有 UpdatePanel 控件的大纲/细节方案****Master/Detail Scenario with UpdatePanel Controls** 在下面的示例中， 在显示 Northwind 数据库的订单和订单详细信息的主/从场景中使用控件。In the following example, an control is used in a master/detail scenario that shows orders and order details from the Northwind database. 一个 控件包含 用于显示订单列表的控件。One control contains the control that displays a list of orders. 第二个 控件包含一个 控件，该控件显示一个订单的详细信息。A second control contains a control that displays the details of one order. 从第一个表中选择订单时，将在第二个表中显示该订单的详细信息。When you select an order from the first table, details for that order are displayed in the second table. 第二个表根据第一个表中的选定内容以异步方式更新。The second table is updated asynchronously based on the selection in the first table. Orders summary 表中的排序和分页操作也会导致部分更新。The sorting and paging operations in the orders summary table also cause partial updates. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel/CS/UpdatePanelExample2CS.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel/VB/UpdatePanelExample2VB.aspx#2)] 如果将控件放置 在控件内 ， 则不支持将控件的属性设置为 `true` 。If you put a control inside an control, setting the control's property to `true` is not supported. 但是，因为 控件支持异步回发，所以更改控件内的控件的任何回发 都会导致与排序和分页回调相同的行为。However, because the control supports asynchronous postbacks, any postbacks that change the control inside an control cause the same behavior as sorting and paging callbacks. **在模板中使用 UpdatePanel 控件****Using an UpdatePanel Control in a Template** 在下面的示例中，控件 的项模板中使用了控件 。In the following example, an control is used in the item template of a control. 将自动生成每个数据行中的控件。 controls in each data row are generated automatically. 每个行的 控件都包含一个 控件，用于显示该行中的项的数量，以及用于 减少和增加数量的控件。Each row's control contains a control to display the quantity of the item in that row and a control to decrease and increase the quantity. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel/CS/UpdatePanelExample3CS.aspx#3)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel/VB/UpdatePanelExample3VB.aspx#3)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数初始化类的新实例 。Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the class. 若要将控件动态添加 到页面，请创建一个新的 实例，然后将子控件添加到该实例的属性公开的控件对象 。To dynamically add an control to a page, create a new instance and then add child controls to the control object that is exposed by the instance's property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何动态创建 控件并将其添加到页中。The following example shows how to dynamically create an control and add it to a page. 当单击控件内的按钮时 ，将用日期和时间刷新消息。When you click the button inside the control, the message is refreshed with the date and time. 使用属性添加子控件 。Child controls are added by using the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Constructor/CS/UpdatePanelConstructorCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Constructor/VB/UpdatePanelConstructorVB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含可用于控件的封闭元素的 CSS 样式特性的集合 `div` 。The property contains a collection of CSS style attributes that can be used in the enclosing `div` element of the control.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示来自 控件的即时子控件的回发是否更新面板的内容。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether postbacks from immediate child controls of an control update the panel's content.

value.span: 如果来自 控件的即时子控件的回发将更新面板的内容，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if postbacks from immediate child controls of the control update the panel's content; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `true` 如果希望来自控件的直接子控件的回发 导致更新面板的内容，请将属性设置为。Set the property to `true` if you want postbacks from immediate child controls of the control to cause an update of the panel's content. 除非 显式调用方法或将子控件定义为触发器，否则嵌套控件的子控件不会导致更新父控件的内容。Child controls of nested controls will not cause an update of the parent control's content unless you call the method explicitly or you define the child controls as triggers. > [!NOTE] > 当 属性设置为 且 属性设置为时 `false` ，将 在方法中引发异常 。When the property is set to and the property is set to `false`, an exception is thrown during the method. 此属性组合不允许用于 控件。This combination of properties is not allowed for the control. `false` 如果你有两个 控件，并且你希望从第一个面板回发来更新第二个面板的内容，但不更新其自己的内容，则可以将设置为。A scenario where you might set to `false` is when you have two controls and you want a postback from the first panel to update the content of the second panel but not update its own content. 例如，第一个面板可能是要购买的产品列表，第二个面板可能是购物车。For example, the first panel might be a list of products to buy and the second panel might be a shopping cart.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于定义 控件内容的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template that defines the content of the control.

value.span: 一个 实例，用于定义 控件的内容。

span.span: An instance that defines the content of the control.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含呈现控件中的内容 。The property contains the content that appears inside an control when it is rendered. 可以通过声明方式或编程方式创建模板的内容。You can create the template's content declaratively or programmatically. 控件的内容模板 是单实例模板。The content template of an control is a single-instance template. 因此，可以直接在页上访问其包含的控件的属性，而无需使用 方法。Therefore, the properties of the controls it contains can be accessed directly on the page without using the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅 类概述。For more information, see the class overview. 若要以 声明方式向控件添加项，请 `` 在控件的开始标记和结束标记之间添加一个元素 。To add items to the control declaratively, add an `` element between the opening and closing tags of the control. 在 `` 元素标记中，声明其他控件和 HTML 元素。Inside the `` element tags, declare other controls and HTML elements. 若要将项动态添加到 控件，请使用 属性，这样便可以添加子控件，而无需创建实现接口的自定义模板 。To add items to the control dynamically, use the property, which enables you to add child controls without having to create a custom template that implements the interface.

exception.span: 在创建模板实例或内容模板容器后，设置 控件的 属性。

span.span: The property of the control is set after an instance of the template is created or after the content template container is created.

related.span: ASP.NET Web 服务器控件模板

span.span: ASP.NET Web Server Controls Templates

summary.span: 获取一个可以以编程方式向其添加子控件的控件对象。

span.span: Gets a control object to which you can programmatically add child controls.

value.span: 一个定义了 控件内容的 对象。

span.span: A object that defines the content of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性使你能够以编程方式向控件添加子控件， 而无需定义从接口继承的自定义模板 。The property enables you to programmatically add child controls to the control without having to define a custom template that inherits from the interface. 如果 以声明方式或通过设计器将内容添加到控件，则应 使用元素向属性添加内容 `` 。If you are adding content to the control declaratively or through a designer, you should add content to the property by using a `` element. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以编程方式指定 控件的属性 。The following example shows how to programmatically specify the property of an control. 当单击时，将设置控件的属性 `Button1` 。The property of a control is set when `Button1` is clicked. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Constructor/CS/UpdatePanelConstructorCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Constructor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.Constructor/VB/UpdatePanelConstructorVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取包含 控件的子控件的 对象。

span.span: Gets the object that contains the child controls for the control.
The collection of child controls for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 从基类重写属性 ，并将其密封以防止附加派生。The property is overridden from the base class and sealed to prevent additional derivation. 若要以 声明方式向控件添加控件，请在 `` 控件标记内创建一个元素 。To add controls to the control declaratively, create a `` element inside the control markup. 若要以编程方式将控件添加到 控件，请使用 属性。To add controls to the control programmatically, use the property.

exception.span: 已调用 类的 、、、 或 方法。

span.span: The , , , , or method of the class has been called.

exception.span: 若要更改 控件的内容，请修改 属性的子控件。

span.span: To change the content of the control, modify the child controls of the property.

summary.span: 创建一个 对象，该对象用作定义 控件内容的子控件的容器。

span.span: Creates a object that acts as a container for child controls that define the control's content.
A container for the control's content.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 此方法旨在供需要扩展控件的控件开发人员使用 。This method is intended for use by control developers who want to extend the control. 例如，在派生类中，你可以提供一个其他根控件，该控件充当 控件内容的容器。For example, in derived classes, you can provide a different root control that acts as a container for your control's content. 默认实现返回一个 对象。The default implementation returns a object. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何重写 自定义控件中的方法， 以始终呈现 `
` `` 面板内容的和元素。The following example shows how to override the method in a custom control to always render the `
` and `` elements for the panel's content. 自定义 控件定义了一个名为 `GroupingText` 的公共属性，该属性是元素内的字符串文字 `` 。The custom control defines a public property named `GroupingText` that is a string literal inside the `` element. 名为的自定义 控件 `CustomUpdatePanel` 派生自 ，并重写 方法。A custom control named `CustomUpdatePanel` derives from and overrides the method. 将 `CustomUpdatePanel` 类源代码置于网站的 App_Code 文件夹中。Put the `CustomUpdatePanel` class source code in the Web site's App_Code folder. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.CreateContentTemplateContainer#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.CreateContentTemplateContainer/CS/App_Code/CustomUpdatePanel.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.CreateContentTemplateContainer#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.CreateContentTemplateContainer/VB/App_Code/CustomUpdatePanel.vb#2)] 自定义 控件用于页面上，就像控件一样 。The custom control is used on the page just as the control is. 下面的示例演示一个包含自定义控件的页 。The following example shows a page that contains the custom control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.CreateContentTemplateContainer#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.CreateContentTemplateContainer/CS/UpdatePanelCreateContentTemplateContainerCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.CreateContentTemplateContainer#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.CreateContentTemplateContainer/VB/UpdatePanelCreateContentTemplateContainerVB.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 返回 控件中包含的所有控件的集合。

span.span: Returns the collection of all controls contained in the control.

returns.span: 一个 对象，该对象包含定义 控件内容的所有控件。

span.span: A object that consists of all controls that define the content of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法由控件开发人员使用。The method is used by control developers. 由于此方法是受保护的，因此它对从类继承的类可见 ，但不能重写。Because this method is protected and sealed, it is visible to classes that inherit from the class, but it cannot be overridden. 当 调用类的、 、、 或 方法时， 此方法将重写基实现以返回引发的专用对象。This method overrides the base implementation to return a specialized object that throws an when the , , , , or method of the class is invoked. 若要更改 控件的内容，请修改 属性的子控件。To change the content of the control, modify the child controls of the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 控件的内容是否包含在 HTML 或 元素中。

One of the values.

value.span: 默认值为 ，以便面板内容包含在 HTML 元素中。

span.span: The default is so that the content of the panel is enclosed in an HTML element.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 如果将 属性设置为 ，则 会在一个 HTML 元素内呈现控件的内容 `` 。If the property is set to , the content of an control is rendered inside an HTML `` element. 如果将 属性设置为，则将 其呈现在 HTML `
` 元素中。If the property is set to , it is rendered inside an HTML `
` element. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何以声明方式设置 属性。The following example shows how to set the property declaratively. `UpdatePanel1` 在 HTML 元素中呈现名为的控件 `` 。The control named `UpdatePanel1` is rendered in an HTML `` element. 如果该 属性设置为 ，则生成的段落会显得相互脱节，因为 HTML 元素的呈现方式 `
` 。If the property were set to , the resulting paragraph would appear disjointed because of the way in which the HTML `
` element is rendered. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.RenderMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.RenderMode/CS/UpdatePanelRenderModeCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.RenderMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.RenderMode/VB/UpdatePanelRenderModeVB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下， `true` 如果 显式调用了方法，或者如果 属性设置为，则属性将返回 。By default, the property returns `true` if the method was explicitly called or if the property is set to . 此属性旨在供需要扩展控件的控件开发人员使用 。This property is intended for use by control developers who want to extend the control. 例如，在派生类中，你可以提供其他逻辑来确定是否 应更新控件。For example, in derived classes, you might provide additional logic to determine whether an control should be updated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性获取已为控件定义的所有触发器的集合 。The property gets a collection of all the triggers that have been defined for the control. (可以通过使用设计器中的 " **UpdatePanelTrigger 集合编辑器** " 对话框或使用控件的元素以声明方式定义触发器 `` 。 ) 集合包含 和 对象。(You can define triggers declaratively by using the **UpdatePanelTrigger Collection Editor** dialog box in the designer or by using the `` element of the control.) The collection includes and objects. 不会在视图状态中跟踪集合中定义的声明性触发器。Declarative triggers that are defined in the collection are not tracked in view state. 当作为命名容器的控件用作触发器时，其所有导致回发的子控件都将表现为触发器。When a control that is a naming container is used as a trigger, all its child controls that cause postback behave as triggers.

summary.span: 导致更新 控件的内容。

span.span: Causes an update of the content of an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果为页启用了部分页呈现，则当您调用方法时 ，将 在浏览器中更新控件的内容。If the page is enabled for partial-page rendering, when you invoke the method, the control's content is updated in the browser. 如果你有必须执行的服务器代码来确定是否应更新控件，请调用方法 。Call the method if you have server code that must execute to determine whether an control should be updated. 如果计划使用 方法，请将 属性设置为 。If you plan to use the method, set the property to . 如果希望决定更新服务器逻辑中的面板，请确保 属性为 `false` ，并且没有为面板定义显式触发器。If you want the decision to update the panel in server logic, ensure that the property is `false` and that no explicit triggers are defined for the panel. 在典型的页开发方案中，如果定义触发器或 属性 `true` 用于 控件，则 会在页面生命周期中自动调用此方法。In a typical page development scenario, if you define triggers or if the property is `true` for the control, the method is automatically called during the page life cycle. 如果 没有为控件定义该属性 ，则不会更新面板。If the property is not defined for the control, no updates of the panel will occur. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法 在自上次更新后超过5秒后更新控件的内容。The following example uses the method to update the content of an control when more than five seconds have elapsed since the last update. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode/CS/UpdatePanelUpdateModeCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode/VB/UpdatePanelUpdateModeVB.aspx#1)]

span.span: The property is set to .

span.span: The method is called during or after the page's event.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示何时更新 控件的内容。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates when an control's content is updated.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 控件不在另一个控件内时 ，面板将随 和属性的设置 （连同触发器的集合）的设置进行更新。When an control is not inside another control, the panel is updated as determined by the settings of the and properties, together with the collection of triggers. 当 控件位于另一个控件内时 ，子面板会在父面板更新时自动更新。When an control is inside another control, the child panel is automatically updated when the parent panel is updated. 在下列情况下，将更新控件的内容：The content of an control is updated in the following circumstances: - 如果将 属性设置为 ，则 会在源自页面上任何位置的每个回发中更新控件的内容。If the property is set to , the control's content is updated on every postback that originates from anywhere on the page. 这包括来自其他控件内的控件的异步回发 以及来自不在控件内的控件的回发 。This includes asynchronous postbacks from controls inside other controls and postbacks from controls that are not inside controls. - 如果 控件嵌套在另一个 控件中，并且更新了父更新面板，则为。If the control is nested inside another control and the parent update panel is updated. - 如果 属性设置为 ，则会出现下列情况之一：If the property is set to , and one of the following conditions occurs: - 显式调用控件的方法 。You call the method of the control explicitly. - 使用控件的属性定义为触发器的控件将导致回发 。The postback is caused by a control defined as a trigger by using the property of the control. 在此方案中，控件显式触发面板内容更新。In this scenario, the control explicitly triggers an update of the panel content. 控件可以在定义触发器的控件内部或外部 。The control can be either inside or outside the control that defines the trigger. - 属性设置为 `true` ，并且控件的子控件 导致回发。The property is set to `true` and a child control of the control causes a postback. 嵌套控件的子控件不 会导致对外部控件的更新， 除非将其显式定义为触发器。A child control of a nested control does not cause an update to the outer control unless it is explicitly defined as a trigger. ## Examples 下面的示例声明了两个 控件。The following example declares two controls. 在第一个面板中， 属性设置为 。In the first panel, the property is set to . 在第二个面板中，将 设置为 。In the second panel, is set to . 通过调用控件的方法，将两个面板外的按钮注册为异步回发控件 。A button outside both panels is registered as an asynchronous postback control by calling the method of the control. 在按钮的 `Click` 事件处理程序中， 如果自上次更新后超过5秒，则会调用第一个面板的方法。In the button's `Click` event handler, the method of the first panel is called if more than five seconds have elapsed since its last update. 在这种情况下，仅当最后一次刷新面板超过5秒之前，才会更新面板的内容。In this scenario, the panel's content is updated only if the last panel refresh was more than five seconds ago. 第二个面板的内容始终更新。The content of the second panel is always updated. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode/CS/UpdatePanelUpdateModeCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel.UpdateMode/VB/UpdatePanelUpdateModeVB.aspx#1)]

exception.span: 指定的类型不是 值之一。

span.span: The specified type is not one of the values.
